DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , single-site , safety efficacy study subject chronic venous stasis ulcer . Patients fall two category : treatment arm ( 24 subject ) non-treatment control arm ( 12 subject ) . The treatment group undergo small liposuction procedure receive placement autologous cell therapy ( stromal vascular fraction SVF ) inject around rim venous stasis wound ( subcutaneously ) follow standard wound debridement , saturation collagen dress material standard over-dressing . Control ( non-treatment ) subject receive debridement dressing change per standard care without SVF .
DOC.brief_title: Healing Chronic Venous Stasis Wounds With Autologous Cell Therapy
